meta.purpose: UI/UX mockup for a premium family TV guide app landing page - marketing homepage design
meta.notes_for_model: This is a web app UI mockup. The design should feel like a luxury home theater experience - warm, inviting, and premium. The aesthetic blends 1970s cinema lobby elegance with modern smart home sophistication. Dark theme with warm gold accents throughout.

story.one_sentence_brief: A stunning dark-themed landing page for Family TV Guide that evokes the feeling of entering a luxury home theater, with warm ambient lighting, elegant typography, and cinema-inspired design elements.
story.additional_context: This is the public marketing page that introduces the app and convinces visitors to sign up. First impression matters - must communicate both premium quality and family-friendly warmth simultaneously.

scene.subject: A full-page web design mockup showing a hero section with a cozy living room background featuring a large TV, plush seating, and warm ambient lighting. The hero displays elegant serif typography reading 'Your Family's TV Guide' with a gold call-to-action button.
secondary_subjects: Floating glassmorphic navigation bar with logo and login button
Feature showcase section with bento grid layout below the fold
Ambient golden light orbs in background
scene.action: Static UI mockup presentation showing the complete landing page design with all sections visible in a scrollable layout preview
scene.location: Digital web browser frame or device mockup showing the landing page at desktop resolution
scene.time_of_day: Evening ambiance - the background image shows a dimly lit living room with warm lamp light, suggesting cozy evening TV viewing
scene.mood: Luxurious yet welcoming, sophisticated but approachable, premium but family-friendly - like entering a high-end home theater

composition.shot_type: Full page screenshot/mockup view showing complete landing page design
composition.framing: The hero section dominates the top 60% of the visible area, with the bento grid feature section partially visible below, encouraging scroll

style.medium: High-fidelity digital UI design mockup with photorealistic background imagery
style.era_or_reference: Modern luxury streaming service UI meets 1970s cinema lobby elegance - think if a boutique hotel designed a TV guide app
style.color_palette: Deep night backgrounds (#0D0F14, #141821), warm cinema gold accents (#D4A853), velvet crimson secondary (#8B2942), warm white text (#F5F0E8), muted cream for secondary text (#A8A199)

lighting.description: The hero background shows soft ambient lighting from wall sconces and a glowing TV screen in a dimly lit room. Heavy vignette darkening the edges. Subtle golden ambient glow emanates from the call-to-action button and accent elements.
lighting.color_and_contrast: High contrast between the dark background and warm gold accents. The text has excellent legibility with subtle text shadows. Gold elements have a soft glow effect.

format.surface_or_output: Desktop web browser mockup at 1920x1080 or higher, suitable for design presentation

elements.placement: Hero section, center-left aligned, positioned over the background image
elements.style: Playfair Display serif font, 700 weight, very large (approximately 4-5rem), warm white color with subtle gold text-shadow glow

elements.content: Track what you're watching, plan your evenings, and never miss an episode. One home, one schedule, everyone in sync.
elements.placement: Below the headline in the hero section
elements.style: DM Sans font, regular weight, medium size, muted cream color, relaxed line-height

elements.placement: Primary CTA button below the subheadline
elements.style: DM Sans font, semibold, cinema gold background (#D4A853), dark text, pill-shaped button with ambient glow effect

elements.placement: Top navigation bar, left side - this is the logo monogram
elements.style: Playfair Display, gold color, within a glassmorphic navigation bar

constraints.factual_accuracy: This is a UI mockup - all interface elements should look functional and properly aligned. Typography hierarchy should be clear and professional.
constraints.safety_and_rights: Do not include any real streaming service logos or copyrighted show imagery. The TV screen in the background should show abstract colorful gradients, not specific content.
